name: Employee Report
query:
SELECT 
   `tabEmployee`.name AS "Employee Code:Link/Employee:100",
   `tabEmployee`.employee_name AS "Employee Name::100",
   `tabEmployee`.date_of_joining AS "DOJ::100",
   `tabEmployee Education`.qualification1 AS "Qualification::100",
   `tabSalary Structure Employee`.from_date AS "Current Date:Date:100",
   `tabSalary Structure`.total_earning AS "Gross Salary:Currency:100"
FROM
 	`tabEmployee`
         Left Join `tabEmployee Education` ON `tabEmployee`.name =`tabEmployee Education`.parent
         Left Join `tabSalary Structure Employee` ON `tabEmployee`.name = `tabSalary Structure Employee`.employee
	 Left Join `tabSalary Structure` ON `tabSalary Structure`.name = `tabSalary Structure Employee`.parent
WHERE
	`tabEmployee`.status = 'Active'
AND
	`tabSalary Structure`.is_active = 'Yes'
